item.title: Assignments for Web Technology
item.description: Week 1 Getting started Working on your project Write down your project vision. Write down your product backlog. Roughly prioritize it for business value. Don’t hesitate to write down as many stories as you want, you don’t have to implement them all. Pick a user story that you can implement with simple CRUD operations. Draw a scribble for the screens involved. Draw a first sketch of the data model that is suffient for this story.
